channel.title: Tampa Host Committee Chairman Al Austin
channel.description: Tampa Host Committee Chairman Al Austin (Remarks as Prepared for Delivery)

item.author: Tampa Host Committee Chairman Al Austin
Tampa Host Committee Chairman Al Austin

item.title: Good afternoon.
item.author: Tampa Host Committee Chairman Al Austin

item.title: It has been my pleasure to serve as chairman of the 2012 Tampa Bay Host Committee. On behalf of the Tampa Bay community, welcome. We're glad you are here.
item.author: Tampa Host Committee Chairman Al Austin

item.title: You may know that we were finalists for the last two conventions, which ultimately went to New York City and then to Minneapolis/St. Paul. Apparently, the third time is a charm.
item.author: Tampa Host Committee Chairman Al Austin

item.title: With more than 15,000 members of the media here from around the globe, I am pleased that Tampa Bay will no longer be the best kept secret in the world.
item.author: Tampa Host Committee Chairman Al Austin

item.title: For me, to stand on this stage, in this city, is the realization of a long-time dream.
item.author: Tampa Host Committee Chairman Al Austin

item.title: There has not been a convention for either party in the state of Florida since 1972. That same year, I was a delegate to the convention in Miami Beach. I have been a delegate or alternate at every convention since then.
item.author: Tampa Host Committee Chairman Al Austin

item.title: And I've been working hard at building my community, and creating jobs and opportunity for the Tampa Bay area.
item.author: Tampa Host Committee Chairman Al Austin

item.title: Having you all here in this Forum will have a significant impact on the future of our region.
item.author: Tampa Host Committee Chairman Al Austin

item.title: Because you chose us, thousands of people have the opportunity to get to know our people, our businesses, our attractions -- and our food. You are creating jobs for caterers, waiters, taxi drivers, and so many more Floridians. And you are filling up hotel rooms that often sit empty after the summer tourism season ends and families head back for their children to start school.
item.author: Tampa Host Committee Chairman Al Austin

item.title: So thank you for stimulating our economy. Hundreds of volunteers have spent countless hours to prepare for the next few days.
item.author: Tampa Host Committee Chairman Al Austin

item.title: We trust that you will enjoy our city and our hospitality, and that you come back often.
item.author: Tampa Host Committee Chairman Al Austin

item.title: Thank you for entrusting us with the great honor of hosting the 2012 Republican National Convention.
item.author: Tampa Host Committee Chairman Al Austin
Tampa Host Committee Chairman Al Austin
